title: Pixel 3 died over night
content:
Yesterday evening I've just plugin my phone to original Pixel 3 charger and go to sleep. 

Today morning - my phone was dead. No reactions to power button, charges (check different chargers, different cables and Wireless charging). 

Zero reactions to power button, power button and volume. 
I've fallow: 
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7167687?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6010316?hl=en
No luck.

Phone is clean, always up to date in stable release channel, never drop into water, newer fall to ground or hasn't been hit. Perfect condition. Only few well known and popular application installed (Google Maps, YouTube, Twitter, Nextcloud etc). 

I suspect that some updates may come overnight and kill it. Anyone have similar issue?
